title: Underwater medicine
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of the Navy, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medicine - Research
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Preventive health services
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medicine, Preventive
description: Shows the work on prevention and treatment of ailments afflicting divers being done by the School of Underwater Medicine at HMAS Penguin, a Naval shore establishment at Balmoral, Sydney. Shows the treatment of injured civilian diver, the education of medical personnel and the research projects being undertaken by the school in association with Sydney universities.
